# Event System Vista provides a comprehensive event system for handling user interactions and application events. ## Event Types - [Event Overview](/wiki/core/events/event-overview/) - Introduction to events - [Click Events](/wiki/core/events/click-events/) - Button clicks and taps - [Input Events](/wiki/core/events/input-events/) - Change and input events - [Mouse Events](/wiki/core/events/mouse-events/) - Hover, enter, leave, down, up - [Keyboard Events](/wiki/core/events/keyboard-events/) - Key presses and bindings - [Focus Events](/wiki/core/events/focus-events/) - Focus and blur events ## Event Example `button "Click Me" [ print "Button clicked!" ]` ## See Also - [Components](/wiki/core/components/) - UI components - [Event System Concepts](/wiki/core/concepts/event-system/) - Architecture
